definition: Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: Eltrix River is the only one river running into the Arctic Ocean in China.
sentences.chinese: 額爾齊斯河是我國流入北冰洋的唯一國際性河流。
